title: Hey Rito, aren't you gonna ask what we like about Galio before reworking him?
body:
Now, I don't play a lot of Galio but I really do love playing him.

I love his damage. He's a tank that can carry with lots of AoE damage. 

I also love his ultimate
So please don't do a Poppy rework on him.  It would be nice if he's still the same champion, just modernized a bit.

Ye that's all. Have a good day

Ok here are the things that I see about Galio: he's suppose to be a tank but the only CC he truly has is his ult, the only recognizable thing about him. So he's a mage? Well not really considering almost every mage is range and Galio is melee. In short, he's broken (not the "damage is insane OP plz nerf" kind, the "his kit doesn't fuction well if at all" kind) 

I feel he needs a Sion/Poppy level rework. Most of his kit is just meh outside of his ult and possibly his shield, which in all honesty they should just have it added to his ult, and doesn't really fit together that well. He's not really in a position like Warwick to just get a modernization to his kit. Warwick's kit had a good theme: lifestealing werewolf that hunts down wounded targets and pounces on them like a horror movie. Galio on the other hand I have no idea what he's suppose to be other than a magic gargoyle who I only know for his massive AoE taunt with a Nunu ult.

But... Sion and Poppy are unrecognizable after their reworks. I admit they were good for the quality of the champion but not for keep the champion in the same realm of gameplay. I was hoping for something more gentle like an Evelynn rework.

Keep his Q the same. Change his W to something more fundamental to his ability to jungle. E needs to lose the slow and either be removed or like just please remove this shit (it's childish looking). And removing his ultimate is completely necessary to keep him competitive. I've never liked it.

I KNOW IT. A Taric-level rework.
I adore the shield and the ult. I just wish everything didn't break the ult channel.

To be fair his ult can incapacitate a team for longer than anything I can think of (Bard's ult makes everyone invulnerable) so it should have some counter play. Yeah, I like his ult and his shield (despite how annoying it can be). Both are unique mechanics that I think are healthy for the game. I'm ok with him doing damage, but I hate how easy it is to land it (or at least how spamable it is). He does so much easy damage they have to hold him back with mana costs.
not to mention you can't screw your own team over with galio ult, the worst you can do is get yourself killed

Agreed.  These are the two main things I'd want to see maintained on his kit.
That, and some form of synergy with magic resistance.


Both are interesting and unique mechanics, but not unfair or oppressive in any way.

It is probably going to be a Sion-level rework.

I don't imagine they'll be keeping much of his current kit.

Sion's passive is different, his Q, E and R are all different too

His old ult was entirely different from his current passive, AoE lifesteal, didn't require him to die, bonus AS instead of setting his AS to a fixed 1.75, no MS ability

I've never liked ANYTHING about Galio. Not even his lore makes sense with all of his skills. 

The only reason Galio is even playable right now is because his mana costs have been reduced. He used to be a troll pick and people would dodge if you picked him. Honestly the whole idea of Galio needs to be redone. His passive forces him to be tanky to benefit from the free AP. Right from that we can assume he's only destined as a counter pick for AP champions. But his ultimate forces people to attack him so he can deal massive damage. It's basically a rigged Nunu ultimate but is roflcountered by Udyr in bear stance (and you definitely rofl hard when you happen to be Udyr and get ulted by Galio while in bear stance).

He's got two poking skills that can help him win lane (these skills used to cost so much mana he couldn't afford to cast without being FORCED to buy mana regen). He also has a "bastion" that he can place on anyone and he gains hp when they take damage (it only heals a maximum of a certain amount after a certain number of auto attacks taken).

He's forced into doing things to be able to benefit from all of his skills. His Q can easily miss when all the champions are zooming around late game. His E doubles as a movespeed escape/chase and the whole party can benefit from it. He's basically forced at this point to max CDR so he can spam his high CD skills. Galio is extremely useless without his skills and you definitely do not feel like a guardian.
Pretty sure they already did a long while back.

Personally I adore his kit as is. I don't find it antiquated at all, but with all the wonderful choices Riot has made in the last year i'm sure they'll destroy him the same way they have other champs. Better to make cookie cutter kits for the masses than anything unique.
